meanings.definition: A person or thing that advances or moves forward.
meanings.sent1: The team of advancers led the way to the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The advancers in the marathon were determined to reach the end.
meanings.sent3: The advancers in the race were so fast, they almost looked like superheroes.
meanings.sent4: The advancers in the project were like a well-oiled machine, propelling it forward effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The advancers were like arrows, cutting through the air with precision.

meanings.definition: Those who make progress or improve in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The young advancers in the science club were eager to learn.
meanings.sent2: The advancers in technology constantly seek new innovations.
meanings.sent3: The advancers in art class always surprise their teacher with their creativity.
meanings.sent4: The advancers in the music industry set new trends with their unique sound.
meanings.sent5: The advancers in the business world are always one step ahead of the competition.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that helps something to move forward or progress.
meanings.sent1: The conveyor belt acted as an advancer for the production line.
meanings.sent2: The advancers in the engine ensure the smooth operation of the vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The little robot was a cute advancer, pushing the toy car along.
meanings.sent4: The advancer in the clock kept the hands moving steadily.
meanings.sent5: The advancer in the toy train set made it chug along the tracks.
